Subject: FSAC jobs not working after upgrade to 11.6 [PERN]
Description:
Hi,

After upgrade, we have discovered one more issue - we cannot succesfuly run FSAC jobs to collect logs from file servers. Please, look on the screen with error and also in the logs. Regards,
Adam Rudnicki
